name: MissingPets
description:
Look for the prompted missing pet in each level amongst others in this cute, dopamine-filled search game! Keep your eyes peeled to advance the levels as the music helps you have a good time and keeps the stress away!

C O N T R O L S 

Left Mouse Button! 

G A M E D E S C R I P T I O N 

Look for the prompted missing pet in each level amongst others in this cute, dopamine-filled search game! Keep your eyes peeled to advance the levels as the music helps you have a good time and keeps the stress away! 

C O N T R I B U T I O N S 

Sam Tancio - In charge of the creation of all audio of the game; music, sound effects, and animal voices. 

Hannah Wigh - In charge of the creation of all game art assets; menu screens, buttons, animals. 

Joe Frumenti - In charge of programming.

Stell Paicos - Helped with programming and art assets, cleanup.
